changes: Add QuizViewer component to allow the user to track individual student's quiz information.
Minor updates to database to improve quiz data storage
Add a minimized view that shows all lessons with student names to quickly survey a week's lessons.
Fixed bug where the lesson creation modal would save text in rich text editor from previous uses in the session.
Updated database to include quiz, student, and curriculum data support
Updated backend to include routes for the new database changes.
Implemented new student tab to the frontend for listing all students.
Created Student card page that allows editing of each student.
Added ability to attach students to lessons and track lesson history for each student.
Fixed bug where backend data does not persist between updates.
Added backup functionality to production server database.
Fixed bug where CSV exports would not parse commas and other characters in data correctly.
Fixed bug where production server would not automatically power on after power loss.
Updated reschedule button to allow the user to choose the time for the new lesson.
Added ability to import lessons into the current week.
Added ability to export the current week's lessons.
Fixed bug where you could not delete lessons if popups for the site were disabled on the browser.
Fixed bug where login tokens would not expire at the correct time.
Updated reschedule button to allow the user to choose the date for the new lesson.
Added the TTGE logo to the navigation bar.
Fixed bug where Saturday lessons would sometimes not populate when adding to the current week.
LessonCards now support rich text
Updated lesson card styling
LessonCards now have a fixed size.
Added a button to copy a lesson into the next week at the same time.
Removed "Card" text on lesson card.
Fixed bug where updated the date of a lesson within the same week context would not move the lesson visually.
Added changelog page.
Extended login token expiration duration.
